channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New Postal Rule Is An Admission That Mail Voting Is A Mess
item.description: This problems with postmarks are more reason why we should limit voting by mail to absentee voting with an excuse.

item.title: Canada’s Mark Carney: Set to Fail
item.description: Though he’ll do it in a (slightly) different way.

item.title: Democrat Lawfare Came For Me, And It Can Come For You Too
item.description: Why do I fight on? Because if I lose, every senior White House advisor will face the same Hobson’s Choice I did: honor the Constitution and risk priso...

item.title: Politico Is Doing Insurance Companies’ Bidding, And It’s Obvious Why
item.description: Politico's latest story about a potential Obamacare subsidy extension ignored sizable evidence of fraud, while including not a single quote from a cri...

item.title: The Best Dating App Is Your Local Church
item.description: The best dating app can only start relationships. Churches can nurture and sustain them.

item.title: Add These Pennsylvania Election Fraud Cases To The Pile Of Other ‘Rare’ Voting Crimes
item.description: Death by a thousand cuts may be the best explanation for how U.S. election integrity has been compromised by expanding voting options.

item.title: Trump reminds foreign companies to employ Americans at U.S. factories
item.description: President Trump is urging foreign nations to hire and train American workers when they set up shop in the U.S.

item.title: Russia Is Not a Defender of Christianity
item.description: The Russian regime is actively persecuting Christians, in Russia itself and in Russian-occupied parts of Ukraine.

item.title: Don’t Abandon the MMR Vaccine
item.description: The legacy of Covid-era overreach is no reason to give measles a new lease on life.

item.title: Washington Times Weekly: Wine, cheese and global trade tensions

item.title: Tim Kaine Is Unable to Say What Makes America Beautiful
item.description: A senator in need of remedial civics — and religion.
